page.title: 09Religion in Saxilby Area
page.content: Less than 10% of the 3200 residents of Saxilby are active members of any church but 50% of children are baptised, 99% have Christian funerals. Church of England - St. Botolph's church has an adult membership of 182. Communicants average 70 at Sunday Parish Communion at 9.30 am. Last year there were 12 baptisms, 9 confirmed, 8 weddings and 7 funerals (cremations are performed in Lincoln). Methodist Church - Once there were 3 chapels. The present Methodist Church opened in 1940 has 101 members. The minister lives in Saxilby and serves 6 chapels. Last year there were 8 baptisms, 8 weddings and 4 funerals. United services are held 5 times annually. Other Christians include Roman Catholics, United Reformed, Baptists, Newlife, Spiritualists and Quakers. There is one Moslem family.
